issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: Voice Over reads the title property of Ti.UI.Tab. Regardless of the values of accessibilityLabel, accessibilityHint and accessibilityValue.
fields.summary: iOS: Ti.UI.Tab accessibility properties do not work

comments.body:
Hi Osama,

Thanks for the report. In order for me to escalate it to engineering I need the following info:

- Ti SDK version
- Simple reproducible test case that we can drop into an app.js and run

Resolving as "Needs more info" for now.

Thanks again.
